title: (x) mean-looking Samuel L. Jackson - Courier (squished) {Mark S, Chesh}
author: primavera

comments.content: Nice icon, Primavera, by the way.

Speaking of which, I swear, every time I see your icon, Mark, I think of Christopher Reeve as Clark Kent. Now I know why I never see you and Supertypedesignerman in the same room...   
   
(Sorry, missed a comma there. I don't actually swear every time I see your icon.)

Yes, it's one of my many clever disguises. Here's a recent one:   
   
 ![beard](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052144im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/26239.gif)
